The ParentIterator class

Class synopsis

ParentIterator
ParentIterator extends RecursiveFilterIterator implements RecursiveIterator , OuterIterator , Traversable , Iterator {
/* Methods */
ParentIterator getChildren ( void )
bool hasChildren ( void )
void next ( void )
void rewind ( void )
}

Table of Contents
